posts.post_content:
This guy and [Mimic Vat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mimic Vat) are going to be ridiculous in casual games. Oh man. [Glimmerpoint Stag](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Glimmerpoint Stag), [Splinter Twin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Splinter Twin) and any simple blue bounce like [Unsummon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Unsummon) will also do nicely.  
  
No idea what to rate this, maybe 3/5 with big combo potential?
